sources.title: Before I Hang (1940)
sources.description: Before I Hang is a 1940 American horror film  starring Boris Karloff. It follows  Dr. John Garth, played by Boris Karloff, is sentenced to death for performing a mercy killing. While on death row, he continues his research on a serum to reverse aging, but after testing it on himself, he becomes younger and develops violent tendencies, leading to a series of murders before ultimately confronting his fate.

metadata.Plot: A physician on death row for a mercy killing is allowed to experiment on a serum using a criminals' blood, but secretly tests it on himself. He gets a pardon, but finds out he's become a Jekyll-&-Hyde.
metadata.Actors: Boris Karloff, Evelyn Keyes, Bruce Bennett
